nodes.bodyText: An example is already defined for ApplicationThrottlePolicy schema definition. Why do we have to repeat an example here?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -262,6 +279,20 @@ paths:
             Location header contains URL of newly created entity.
           schema:
             $ref: '#/definitions/ApplicationThrottlePolicy'
+          examples:
+            application/json:

nodes.bodyText: Since ApplicationThrottlePolicy is an extension of ThrottlePolicy when fetching the schema level example, it always displays the generic example values given in ThrottlePolicy definition. Therefore had to add a response level example(which has higher precedence than the schema level example) to override the generic example in a meaningful way.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -262,6 +279,20 @@ paths:
             Location header contains URL of newly created entity.
           schema:
             $ref: '#/definitions/ApplicationThrottlePolicy'
+          examples:
+            application/json:

nodes.bodyText: Shall we remove x-wso2-curl,  x-wso2-request, x-wso2-response extensions, since they are not in use?
